properties.comment: /** * Persistent classes for a CMDB * * @copyright Copyright (C) 2010-2012 Combodo SARL * @license http://opensource.org/licenses/AGPL-3.0 */

field.filter: SELECT l FROM Organization AS child JOIN Organization AS root ON child.parent_id BELOW root.id JOIN Location AS l ON l.org_id=root.id WHERE child.id=:this->org_id

method.comment: /** * Overload the display of the properties to add a tab (the first one) * with the preview of the document */

field.filter: SELECT l FROM Organization AS child JOIN Organization AS root ON child.parent_id BELOW root.id JOIN Location AS l ON l.org_id=root.id WHERE child.id= :this->org_id
SELECT Model WHERE brand_id=:this->brand_id AND type=:this->finalclass
